description: Describes a version of a SageMaker AI image.

nested_items.name: BaseImage
nested_items.description: The registry path of the container image on which this image version is based.

nested_items.name: ContainerImage
nested_items.description: The registry path of the container image that contains this image version.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: When the version was created.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: When a create or delete operation fails, the reason for the failure.

nested_items.name: ImageArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the image the version is based on.

nested_items.name: ImageVersionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the version.

nested_items.name: ImageVersionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the version.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: When the version was last modified.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version number.

nested_items.name: VendorGuidance
nested_items.description: The stability of the image version specified by the maintainer.
NOT_PROVIDED: The maintainers did not provide a status for image version stability.
STABLE: The image version is stable.
TO_BE_ARCHIVED: The image version is set to be archived. Custom image versions that are set to be archived are automatically archived after three months.
ARCHIVED: The image version is archived. Archived image versions are not searchable and are no longer actively supported.

nested_items.name: JobType
nested_items.description: Indicates SageMaker AI job type compatibility.
TRAINING: The image version is compatible with SageMaker AI training jobs.
INFERENCE: The image version is compatible with SageMaker AI inference jobs.
NOTEBOOK_KERNEL: The image version is compatible with SageMaker AI notebook kernels.

nested_items.name: MLFramework
nested_items.description: The machine learning framework vended in the image version.

nested_items.name: ProgrammingLang
nested_items.description: The supported programming language and its version.

nested_items.name: Processor
nested_items.description: Indicates CPU or GPU compatibility.
CPU: The image version is compatible with CPU.
GPU: The image version is compatible with GPU.

nested_items.name: Horovod
nested_items.description: Indicates Horovod compatibility.

nested_items.name: ReleaseNotes
nested_items.description: The maintainer description of the image version.
